title: Negative Trait
description: Roll on the Negative Traits table.

title: Extreme Nervousness
description: The extreme nervousness you feel just makes things worse. Gain 5 permanent Stress.

title: Shaking Hands
description: Your shaking hands can barely hold a thing. Take –1 to either Close Combat or Ranged Combat.

title: Distracted
description: Distracted by shadows, you can't focus on anything. Take –1 Perception.

title: Fluttering Heart
description: Your heart is fluttering and you have problems breathing. Take –1 Stamina.

title: Broken Inside
description: You feel as if something broke inside of you. Take –1 WIL.

title: Hyperventilation
description: You hyperventilate when you enter combat, immediately expending 1× Oxygen Pellet.

title: Deep Anxiety
description: Stressful situations fill you with a deep anxiety that can only be suppressed with physical pain. Each time you gain Stress, receive 1 Wound.

title: Heart Attack
description: This stress is so intense that you suffer a heart attack. Pass a CON check or die.
